short_summary: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada is seeking commissioning services for the construction of the new High Commission of Canada project in Canberra, Australia.
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada (DFATD) is seeking commissioning services for the construction of the new High Commission of Canada project in Canberra, Australia. Commissioning services will encompass all building systems, including mechanical systems (ventilation, heating and air conditioning), hydraulic systems (water distribution systems, wastewater collection and distribution systems, collection systems and rainwater distribution systems, pumps), as well as mechanically operated systems such as blinds and shading devices powered, electrical infrastructure and distribution, fire protection, vertical transportation and permeability of the building envelope.
full_summary:
### Commissioning Services for the High Commission of Canada in Australia
#### Tender Notice

**Reference Number:** cb-305-50120764
**Solicitation Number:** 24-248145
**Publication Date:** January 25, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 21, 2024, 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** March 1, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 1, 2026

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada (DFATD) invites eligible Suppliers to submit a proposal for Commissioning Services for the construction of the new High Commission of Canada project in Canberra, Australia. The commissioning services will ensure that all building systems are properly installed, tested, and validated to meet the required standards and specifications.

**Scope of Work:**

* Commissioning of mechanical systems, including ventilation, heating, and air conditioning
* Commissioning of hydraulic systems, including water distribution, wastewater collection, and distribution systems
* Commissioning of mechanically operated systems, including blinds and shading devices
* Commissioning of electrical infrastructure and distribution
* Commissioning of fire protection systems
* Commissioning of vertical transportation systems
* Commissioning of building envelope permeability

**Key Requirements:**

* The Supplier must have experience in commissioning complex building systems
* The Supplier must have a proven track record of delivering commissioning services in Australia
* The Supplier must be able to provide a comprehensive commissioning plan and schedule
* The Supplier must be able to provide a detailed commissioning report and documentation

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Technical merit
* Price

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**

* Meagan Leclair
* Email: realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 598-9721
